`${url},${JSON.stringify(options)}` : url; } function arrayToImg(arr, func, baseUrl, options) { let result = []; for (let item of arr) { let imgUrl = addOptions(item, baseUrl, options); let imgTag = ``; if (typeof func === "function") { imgTag = func(imgUrl); } result.push(imgTag); } return result.join("\n"); } function stringToImg(str, func, baseUrl, options) { let imgUrl = addOptions(str, baseUrl, options); let imgTag = ``; if (typeof func === "function") { imgTag = func(imgUrl); } return imgTag; } function load(urls) { for (i = 0; i < urls.length; i++) { if (!urls[i].includes("coco_keys.json")){ url = urls[i] + 'User_Activation.json'; } else { url = urls[i]; } let response = java.ajax(url); if (JSON.stringify(response).includes("qyyuapi") || JSON.stringify(response).includes("C_DATA")){ return [response, urls[i]]; } } throw "Error: 所有链接下载失败"; } function parseKeys() { let jsBaseUrls = [ "https://raw.githubusercontents.com/xiaohan231/decodeObfuscator/main/", "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/xiaohan231/decodeObfuscator/main/", "https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/xiaohan231/decodeObfuscator@main/" ]; let urls = [ "plugins/common.js", "plugins/cocomanhua.js", "tools/babel_asttool.js", "tools/config.js", "tools/decode.js", "tools/decodeOb.js", "tools/usefulPlugins.js" ]; let jsBaseUrl = cache.get(`cache_js}`); if (!jsBaseUrl) { jsBaseUrl = load(jsBaseUrls)[1]; java.toast('\n\n' + jsBaseUrl); cache.put(`cache_js}`, jsBaseUrl); } function toAbsUrl(url) { return /^\.\/|^http|^content|^\/sdcard|^\/storage/.test(url) ? url : jsBaseUrl.concat(url); } function loadJS(urls) { let scripts = ""; for (let url of urls) { let absoluteUrl = toAbsUrl(url); let content = java.ajax(absoluteUrl); let scriptTag = script(content); scripts += scriptTag; } return scripts; } function script(content) { return ``; } let html = `${loadJS(urls)}`; return java.webView(html, Get('url'), "keys"); } function fetchRemoteKeys() { let remoteUrls = [ "https://raw.githubusercontents.com/xiaohan231/autoCI/cocokeys/coco_keys.json", "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/xiaohan231/autoCI/cocokeys/coco_keys.json", "https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/xiaohan231/autoCI@cocokeys/coco_keys.json", ]; remoteKeys = load(remoteUrls)[0]; return remoteKeys; } if (String(book['author']) !== "xiaohan231") { let DEBUG = 0; let local_keys = null; function base64Decode(base64) { return java.base64Decode(base64) + ""; } let aes = { keys: null, retryNum: 2, saveKeys: function (keysString) { try { this.keys = JSON.parse(keysString); let localKeys = cache.get(`cache_keysString_${Get('url')}`); if (localKeys !== keysString) { cache.put(`cache_keysString_${Get('url')}`, keysString); return true; } } catch (e) { java.log(keysString); java.log("❎密钥解析错误！！"); } }, _aesDecrypt: function (key, word) { return java.createSymmetricCrypto("aes/ecb/pkcs7padding", key).decryptStr(word) + ""; }, decrypt: function (word, name) { if (this.keys && this.keys[name]) { for (let key of this.keys[name]) { try { return this._aesDecrypt(key, word); } catch {} } } if (this.retryNum-- > 0) { if ((this.retryNum == 2 && this.saveKeys(parseKeys())) || (this.retryNum == 1 && this.saveKeys(fetchRemoteKeys()))) { return this.decrypt(word, name); } } throw "❎解密失败，无法获取密钥！！"; } }; function decodeImage(src) { let C_DATA = src.match(/C_DATA\s*=\s*\S([\s\S]+?)['"]/); if (!C_DATA) { throw "❎图片数据C_DATA获取失败！！"; } C_DATA = aes.decrypt(base64Decode(C_DATA[1]), "C_DATA"); DEBUG && java.log(C_DATA); eval(C_DATA); let html = ""; if (!image_info.img_type) { let path = mh_info.enc_code2 ? servers[0] : servers[0].replace(/^img/, `img${mh_info.use_server}`); let options = {}; let suffix = "jpg"; if (image_info.imgKey !== undefined && image_info.imgKey !== '' || image_info.keyType !== undefined && image_info.keyType !== '') { if (image_info.keyType === '0') { colakey = aes.decrypt(image_info.imgKey, "C_DATA"); } else { let colajsonUrls = ["https://qyyuapi.com/cola.json"]; for (let i = 0; i < colajsonUrls.length; i++) { try { let response = java.ajax(colajsonUrls[i]); colakey = JSON.parse(response)[image_info.keyType]; break; } catch (e) { java.log(`❎加载${colajsonUrls[i]}密钥文件错误`); } }; if (colakey == '' || colakey == null) { java.log(`❎远程密钥文件未更新，请30分钟后再试`); } } options = { "key": enc_webp_bytes_key = colakey, "headers": { "Cookie": `_tka_${mh_info.pageid}=${path};_tkb_${mh_info.pageid}=${totalImageCount}`, "Origin": Get('url') } }; suffix = "enc.webp"; } if (DEBUG) totalImageCount = 1; for (; mh_info.startimg <= totalImageCount; mh_info.startimg++) { let imgPath = `https://${server}/comic/${encodeURIComponent(path)}${String(mh_info.startimg).padStart(4, "0")}.${suffix}`; html += stringToImg(imgPath, null, baseUrl, options) + "\n"; } } else { let urls__direct = base64Decode(image_info.urls__direct).split("|SEPARATER|"); if (DEBUG) urls__direct.splice(0, 1); if (image_info.img_type === 1) { html = arrayToImg(urls__direct, url => url + ".webp", baseUrl); } else { html = arrayToImg(urls__direct, null, baseUrl); } } return html; } (function () { if (local_keys !== null && local_keys !== '') { aes.keys = local_keys; } else if (cache.get('keysString') !== null && cache.get('keysString') !== '') { aes.saveKeys(cache.get('keysString')); } else { !DEBUG && aes.saveKeys(parseKeys()); aes.retryNum = 1; DEBUG && aes.saveKeys(fetchRemoteKeys()); } return decodeImage(src); })(); } else { '
